Detailed Description

The Hub.

jcom.hub performs a large part of the automagic part of Jamoma. This includes things such as saving and recalling presets, resizing modules to one of the standard sizes forwarding of control messages to jcom.in and so on.

Definition at line 60 of file jcom.hub.h.
